## R Markdown Syntax

## Headings


```{r}
# First Level Heading

#### Fourth Level Heading
```

## Typefaces {.build}

Raw text is raw text.  

To *italicize* text, put an asterisk around it.
```
To *italicize* text, put an asterisk around it
```

And to **embolden** text, use two asterisks.
```
And to **embolden**, use two asterisks.
```
